answers.answer: Should they of changed my due date Seems thow my baby girl was measuring 32weeks and 5days when i had my scan

Hey. The same has happened to be..but I have Gestational diabetes and that's the reason my baby is bigger than he should be. He is also a week bigger than what he's supposed to be. And they did not change my due date either. If anything you may have your baby a week early which most people want anyways. Good luck! And I wouldn't sweat it as long as you have a healthy baby the due date doesn't matter..it will be around the date they gave you though. .it's rarely ever on the due date..
audreyny i havent got gestional diabetes but I hope my baby girl is ok and that's all that matters is that shes healthy

At 31wks my baby was in the 83rd percentile at 4lbs13oz.  I think thats measuring about 10days ahead. If due date was confirmed early on, after 20wks they don't tend to change your due date. They're more likely to look at the weight tracking and if its consistent you could just be having a big baby, and if not then they may look at causes such as gd. I don't have gd either, just big babies :)

question: Has anyone ever had a scan a was told that their baby was weighing 1,829+279 meaning 4pounds and 2ozs and they were right I think was it right they said my baby girl is 4pound 0-2ozs that was at 31weeks and 5days I had a scan  because they wanted to see how much she was weighing I'm now 31weeks today at 28weeks and 1days she was weighing 2pounds 12ozs but when they measured her head it said 32weeks and 5days but the women didn't change me due date and my baby girls got a fat stomach and her head is big x please reply
title: ok just a question please answer
